sentences.sentence: Wang Hao is an 18-year-old student from Shenzhen.
sentences.translation: 王浩是一名来自深圳的18岁学生。

sentences.sentence: Liu Hao always works to high standards, and he never allows himself behind others.
sentences.translation: 刘浩总是按照高标准工作，从不让自己落后于别人。

sentences.sentence: Liu Hao is the chief engineer of the high-speed railway connecting Moonlight Town to Nanjing.
sentences.translation: 刘浩是月光镇至南京高铁的总工程师。
